issue.title: Issue comments thread in detail panel

phases.title: Backend: Rust commands for fetch/post comments
phases.content:
Add Rust commands to fetch and post GitHub issue comments via gh CLI.

Files to modify:
1. apps/desktop/src-tauri/src/github.rs - Add GitHubComment/GitHubUser structs, fetch_issue_comments and post_issue_comment commands
2. apps/desktop/src-tauri/src/lib.rs - Register new commands in generate_handler! macro
verification: cargo check in apps/desktop/src-tauri compiles without errors

phases.title: Frontend: Comments display with markdown rendering
phases.content:
Install react-markdown + remark-gfm, create IssueComments component, integrate into IssueDetail.

Files:
1. Install react-markdown and remark-gfm in apps/desktop
2. apps/desktop/src/components/detail/IssueComments.tsx - New component to fetch and display comments
3. apps/desktop/src/components/detail/IssueComments.css - Styling
4. apps/desktop/src/components/detail/IssueDetail.tsx - Integrate IssueComments below body
verification: Comments display below issue body with avatars, author, timestamp, markdown-rendered body

phases.title: Post comment form and polish
